It can then make a ranged weapon attack with the caught missile, which has an attack bonus of {@d20 +5}, a normal range of 20 feet, and a long range of 60 feet. On a hit, the target takes 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) damage of the missile's type.

trait.name: Spirit Hand
entries: The initiate can cast {@spell mage hand} at will, requiring no verbal or somatic components. The initiate can cast this spell and control the hand as a bonus action, and when the initiate casts the spell, it can make the hand {@condition invisible}.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the initiate is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The initiate makes two attacks.

action.name: Spirit Strike
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) force damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the leader is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the leader instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Spirit Hand
entries: The leader can cast {@spell mage hand} at will, requiring no verbal or somatic components. The leader can cast this spell and control the hand as a bonus action, and when the leader casts the spell, it can make the hand {@condition invisible}.

trait.name: Stunning Strike (1/Turn)
entries: When the leader hits a creature with a melee attack, it can force the target to make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition stunned} until the end of the leader's next turn.

trait.name: Supernatural Attacks
entries: The leader's weapon attacks are magical, and its Spirit Strike can hit targets on the Ethereal Plane.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the leader is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

trait.name: Invisibility (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the leader can magically turn {@condition invisible} until the start of its next turn, or until it makes an attack or casts a spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The leader makes four attacks.

action.name: Spirit Strike
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) force damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Deflect Missile
entries: When the leader is hit by a ranged weapon attack, it deflects the missile, reducing the damage by 26 ({@dice 1d10 + 21}). If the damage is reduced to 0, the leader catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and the leader has a hand free. It can then make a ranged weapon attack with the caught missile, which has an attack bonus of {@d20 +8}, a normal range of 20 feet, and a long range of 60 feet. On a hit, the target takes 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) damage of the missile's type.

reaction.name: Phase (5/Day)
entries: When the leader is hit by an attack, it partially slips into the Border Ethereal, reducing the damage it takes from the attack by 16 ({@dice 2d10 + 5}).

variant.name: Durheim Leader with Lightseer's Gaze
entries: The {@item lightseer's gaze|GriffonsSaddlebag2} is a precious and heavily guarded artifact within Durheim Monastery, originally worn by Lightseer Attiskin. He left explicit provision that only in times of dire need should the mantle of Lightseer be taken up. Wearing the {@item lightseer's gaze|GriffonsSaddlebag2} causes {@condition blinded|PHB|blindness}, but the stars and celestial bodies in the heavens are still visible. The mysterious item also rewrites history, forcing the bearer to select a new name - only the bearer is aware that they ever had a different name.
At the GM's discretion, a Durheim Leader can wield the {@item lightseer's gaze|GriffonsSaddlebag2}, causing the following changes to its stat block:

items: It has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks.
It has {@sense blindsight} out to a range of 120 feet, but is blind beyond this radius.
It gains the Innate Spellcasting trait below.

entries.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries: The leader's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}). The leader can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
2/day: {@spell spirit guardians}
4/day: {@spell calm emotions}

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The dyra can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Damage Transfer
entries: Whenever the dyra takes damage while grappling a creature, the creature {@condition grappled} by it also takes half the damage the dyra took.

trait.name: Lightning Susceptibility
entries: If the dyra takes lightning damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the start of its next turn, and if it's grappling a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or the grapple ends.

trait.name: Metal Stride
entries: While moving on a metallic object, structure, or surface, the dyra's speed is doubled.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The dyra can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dyra makes two pseudopod attacks.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, the dyra can't constrict another target, and the target takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Electrical Overload
entries: If the dyra takes 25 lightning damage or more during a single turn, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The dyra is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The dyra's weapon attacks are considered magical.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The dyra deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dyra uses its Electrostatic Discharge, if available. It then makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Electrostatic Discharge {@recharge 5}
entries: The dyra expels a burst of electricity in a 15-foot radius around itself. Each creature other than the dyra in the area must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) lightning damage and is {@condition stunned} until the end of the dyra's next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

reaction.name: Voltaic Grounding
entries: When the dyra is subjected to lightning damage, it makes a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, it takes no damage instead and its Electrostatic Discharge immediately recharges if it wasn't already charged.

monster.name: Elder Lava Wurm
languages: and Terran but can't speak them

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The wurm can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: The wurm can only fly for up to 1 minute at a time. If it ends its turn in the air after 1 minute of consecutive flight and nothing else is holding it aloft, it falls.

trait.name: Noxious Resilience
entries: The wurm has advantage on saving throws made against harmful gases and vapors (such as the effects of a stinking cloud or a green dragon's poison breath).

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The wurm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Volcanic Body
entries: The wurm sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. In addition, whenever a creature enters the area within 10 feet of the wurm for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, that creature takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wurm makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

action.name: Molten Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The wurm exhales molten metal in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 38 ({@damage 11d6}) fire damage and its speed is reduced by 15 feet. If a target's speed is reduced to 0 by this effect, it becomes {@condition restrained}. A creature can take an action to scrape or wash off the metal, ending the effect. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and its speed isn't reduced.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The fish can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The fish can see 30 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

action.name: Ether Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 1 force damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The fish enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The trickster's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The trickster makes two attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The trickster enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

bonus.name: Spectral Sight (Recharges After a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the trickster can gain the effects of the {@spell see invisibility} spell for 1 minute or until its {@status concentration} ends (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The battlechef is an 8th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@d20 +6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Divine Strike (1/Turn)
entries: When the battlechef hits a creature with a weapon attack, the battlechef can cause the attack to deal an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid or poison damage (battlechef's choice) to the target.

trait.name: Poison Resilience
entries: The battlechef has advantage on saving throws against {@condition poisoned|PHB|poison}.

trait.name: Strong Stomach (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: While the battlechef is {@condition drunkenness|GriffonsSaddlebag2|drunk}, it can choose to magically suppress the alcohol's effects for 1 minute.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Create Healing Draft (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The battlechef creates a magical potion in its free hand or at its feet (battlechef's choice). A creature that drinks this potion regains 15 ({@dice 2d6 + 8}) hit points. The potion turns to dust and is lost if the battlechef finishes a short or long rest before it is consumed.

reaction.name: Table-Turner (3/Day)
entries: When the battlechef is hit by an attack from a creature within 5 feet of it, the creature must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned|PHB} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned|PHB}.

resist.note: from Nonmagical Attacks that aren't Adamantine

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The fleshcrafter is an 8th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Flesh Bond
entries: As long as the fleshcrafter and its flesh golem are within 120 feet of each other, the fleshcrafter can communicate with it telepathically. In addition, whenever the fleshcrafter casts a spell with a range of touch while within 120 feet of the golem, the golem can use its reaction to deliver the spell as if it had cast the spell, using the fleshcrafter's spell attack modifier and save DC. Whenever the fleshcrafter takes lightning damage, the golem regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

trait.name: Frenzy Control
entries: While the fleshcrafter is alive and conscious, its flesh golem can't go berserk. If the fleshcrafter dies, its flesh golem immediately goes berserk.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Flintclaw
languages: understands Abyssal and Infernal but can't speak them

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The flintclaw has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the flintclaw moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the flintclaw can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: The flintclaw's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet when it has a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The flintclaw makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Dungeon Born
entries: The geleton has advantage on any ability checks it makes to locate or identify hidden features of dungeons, such as traps or secret passageways.

trait.name: Ooze Ancestry
entries: The geleton doesn't need to breathe. The geleton doesn't require sleep, gaining the benefits of a long rest after spending 4 hours in a trance-like state. The geleton has advantage on saving throws against disease.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The geleton makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Germination Stall
languages: the languages its staff knew in life

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The stall's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). The stall can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Alluring Affluence
entries: Whenever a humanoid ends its turn within 60 feet of the stall, it must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has no hint that it is gradually falling under the effects of the stall's enchantment. If a creature succeeds on three of these saves, it is immune to this effect for the next 24 hours. If the creature fails three of these saves, it becomes {@condition charmed} by the stall and must use all its movement on its turns to get as close to the stall as possible. The effect lasts for 24 hours or until the stall dies, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or ends the effect on the creature as a bonus action.

trait.name: Dedicated Staff
entries: The stall comprises a staff of 5 ({@dice 2d4}) {@creature seed coin pollinator|GriffonsSaddlebag2|seed coin pollinators}. This staff collectively shares the stall's Innate Spellcasting and Magic Resistance traits, they can't willingly move more than 150 feet away from the stall, and they seek to defend the stall at all costs, including to their own peril. Some of the stall's effects can use a member or members of its staff as the point of origin.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: The stall is indistinguishable from a normal merchant stall. However, a creature that has {@sense truesight} sees a deep red aura radiating from the stall, and a creature within 30 feet of it that is under the effect of a {@spell detect poison and disease} spell senses the insidious nature of the stall and knows it is a plant creature.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The stall has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The stall doesn't require sleep. If the stall spends 1 hour in direct sunlight, it receives enough nourishment to sustain itself for one day. If the stall dies, it decomposes and is reduced to dirt within 7 days.

action.name: Enthralling Vines
entries: The stall causes dark, creeping vines to protrude from itself and its staff, lashing out at creatures nearby. Each creature of the stall's choice within 10 feet of it or a member of its staff must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by the vines for 1 minute. While {@condition restrained} in this way, a creature has disadvantage on saving throws against the stall's Alluring Affluence. A creature {@condition restrained} by the vines can use its action to make a {@dc 14} Strength check, freeing itself on a success. These vines disappear if the stall dies, or if it uses this action again. It can also choose to end the effect early on any number of {@condition restrained} creatures it chooses as a bonus action.

action.name: Hostile Takeover
entries: The stall attempts to magically compel one creature {@condition charmed} by it that is within 5 feet of the stall or a member of its staff to swallow a {@creature seed coin|GriffonsSaddlebag2}. The target must make a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target swallows the coin and is subjected to the seed coin's Infestation. When subjected to the effect in this way, the diseased creature is killed in a number of hours equal to half its Wisdom score, unless the disease is removed. If the target successfully saves against this effect or the effect ends for it, it regurgitates the coin and is no longer {@condition charmed} by the stall, and it is immune to the stall's Alluring Affluence for the next 24 hours.

monster.name: Ghost Dragon

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The dragon can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The dragon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@dice 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Horrifying Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Withering Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) necrotic damage, plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage.

action.name: Withering Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Withering Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d8 + 1}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Horrifying Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target also ages {@dice 1d4 × 10} years. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the {@condition frightened} condition on itself of a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Horrifying Presence for the next 24 hours. The aging effect can be reversed with a {@spell greater restoration} spell, but only within 24 hours of it occurring.

action.name: Chilling Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales deathly cold energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 ({@damage 18d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendaryHeader: The dragon can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Etherealness (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) necrotic damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The antlion has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has {@status surprised}.

trait.name: Burrowed Camouflage
entries: While it is at least partially burrowed, the antlion has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in sand or loose earth.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends the antlion can't bite another target.

reaction.name: Snapping Jaws
entries: While the antlion is benefiting from its Burrowed Camoflage and not grappling a creature, when a creature the antlion can sense moves into the antlion's space, it can make a bite attack against that creature.

trait.name: Bloodmire Adaptation
entries: The eel is immune to the diseases described in the {@table Bloodmire Diseases|GriffonsSaddlebag2} table.

trait.name: Water and Blood Breathing
entries: The eel can breathe only underwater or under bloodwater.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eel makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a  successful one.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The snake can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the snake moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its horns on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The snake makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its horns. It can use its constrict attack in place of one other attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage and become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the snake can't constrict another target.

action.name: Horns
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) force damage.

action.name: Hypnotize {@recharge}
entries: The snake causes its horns to begin flashing with a dazzling array of colors. Each creature of the snake's choice within 60 feet of it that can see it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} by the snake for 1 minute. A {@condition charmed} creature must spend each of its turns moving toward the snake by the shortest and most direct route. A {@condition charmed} creature already within 5 feet of the snake doesn't move and takes no actions on its turn. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the snake has advantage on attack rolls against the creature. If an affected creature takes any damage, or if another creature uses an action to shake the creature out of its trance, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Bloodmire Adaptation
entries: The mosquito is immune to the diseases described in the {@table Bloodmire Diseases|GriffonsSaddlebag2} table.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The rat has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the rat's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The rat can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

trait.name: Flora Flit
entries: Once on each of its turns, the lizard can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into any living flora (such as a plant, mold, or fungus) within 5 feet of it and emerge from a second living flora within 60 feet of it, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second flora. Both florae must be Medium or larger. If the lizard takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Nature Stride
entries: Moving through nonmagical {@quickref difficult terrain||3} costs the lizard no extra movement. It can also pass through nonmagical plants without being slowed by them and without taking damage from them if they have thorns, spines, or a similar hazard.

trait.name: Organic Camouflage
entries: The lizard has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in flora.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Retaliatory Spores
entries: When the lizard takes bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, it ejects a flurry of poisonous spores around itself. Each creature within 5 feet of the lizard must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition poisoned} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: Grihoo can hold its breath indefinitely.

trait.name: Infinite Heads
entries: Grihoo has an infinite number of heads. Whenever it takes 60 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. On its next turn, the number of attacks it makes as part of its Multiattack decreases by one (to a minimum of three) and it can't use its Snapping Frenzy. At the end of Grihoo's turn, it replaces all of its missing heads that died since its last turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If Grihoo fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Grihoo has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Grihoo's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: Grihoo can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Grihoo makes five bite attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 18} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) force damage.

action.name: Snapping Frenzy
entries: Grihoo unleashes a flurry of bites in its vicinity, making one bite attack against any number of creatures within 30 feet of it, with a separate attack roll for each target.

action.name: Transpositional Swallow {@recharge 5}
entries: Grihoo chooses one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Charisma saving throw or be teleported inside of Grihoo's stomach. While inside Grihoo, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Grihoo, and it takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) acid damage and 28 ({@damage 8d6}) force damage at the start of each of Grihoo's turns.

If Grihoo takes 60 damage or more on a single turn, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or expel all creatures that were teleported inside of it, teleporting them to a random space on the ground within 60 feet of Grihoo. If Grihoo dies, a creature that was teleported inside of it is no longer {@condition restrained} and can escape from the corpse by using 60 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Counter Conjuration
entries: When a creature Grihoo can see or hear within 300 feet of it casts a conjuration spell or magically summons a creature, Grihoo interrupts the casting or summoning, causing it to fail and have no effect. Grihoo then regains hit points equal to 15 times the spell slot's level, if it interrupted a spell, or equal to the challenge rating of the creatures being summoned, if it interrupted a summoning.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: Grihoo makes one bite attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Grihoo magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Crushing Infinity (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Grihoo channels the overwhelming weight of infinity, crushing each creature inside of it. A swallowed creature must make a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The tyrannosaur's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The tyrannosaur can innately cast the following spells, requiring only somatic components:

trait.name: Enraged Casting {@recharge 4}
entries: While the tyrannosaur has half of its hit points or fewer, it can cast one of its innate spells as a bonus action, even if the normal casting time for that spell is an action.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The tyrannosaur has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tyrannosaur makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}32 ({@damage 4d12 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the tyrannosaur can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The grymhare can use a bonus action to polymorph into a Tiny rabbit, or back into its true form, which is Medium. Its statistics, other than its size and its available actions, are the same in either form. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Grappler
entries: The grymhare has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The grymhare has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The grymhare has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the grymhare surprises a creature and hits it with a beak attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The grymhare makes one attack with its tentacles against each creature of its choice within its reach simultaneously. It then makes one beak attack.

action.name: Beak (True Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite (Rabbit Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tentacle (True Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}) and the grymhare pulls it up to 5 feet straight toward it.

monster.name: H'rethi, Soul of the Desert
languages: telepathy 1 mile and understands Common and Terran but can't speak

trait.name: Immovable
entries: H'rethi can't move or be moved by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: H'rethi is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When H'rethi fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: H'rethi has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Shattering Destruction
entries: When H'rethi drops to 0 hit points, it shatters and is destroyed. Any creature on the ground within 30 feet of H'rethi must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) piercing damage and 22 ({@damage 4d10}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: H'rethi makes three Soul Ray attacks.

action.name: Soul Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 11} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage, and the target is pushed up to 10 feet away.

action.name: Fortify {@recharge 5}
entries: H'rethi gains 50 temporary hit points, and all attack rolls made against it have disadvantage until the start of its next turn.

reaction.name: Absorb Magic (3/Day)
entries: When H'rethi takes damage from a spell or other magical effect, it instead takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the damage dealt. H'rethi is still subject to any other effects that might accompany the damage.

legendary.name: Sand Lash
entries: A tendril-like whip rises from the ground, striking at one creature within 120 feet of H'rethi. The target must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) slashing damage, and if it is Large or smaller, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). If the target is already {@condition grappled}, it becomes {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends.

legendary.name: Create Sentry (2 Actions)
entries: H'rethi creates a 5-foot-radius, 15-foot-high pillar of compacted sand in an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet of it. When H'rethi uses its Multiattack on its turn, it can make one additional SouI Ray attack for each pillar that exists. Each of these additional attacks originates from a different pillar and only deals the force damage from the attack. The pillar is an object that can be damaged and thus destroyed. It has AC 15 and 30 hit points. Reducing the pillar to 0 hit points causes it to crumble into dust.

legendary.name: Dispel Magic (2 Actions)
entries: H'rethi casts {@spell dispel magic}. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma for this spell.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hammerhead can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The hammerhead has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The hammerhead can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The hammerhead has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The hammerhead's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hammerhead makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its slam, and one with its tail.

action.name: Banishing Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the hammerhead. A swallowed creature is considered to be on the Ethereal Plane, it is {@condition incapacitated}, and it takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) force damage at the start of each of the hammerhead's turns. A swallowed creature can make a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw at the start of each of its turns. On a successful save, the creature reappears in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of the hammerhead.

If the hammerhead takes 50 or more damage in a single turn, it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which reappear in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of the hammerhead. If the hammerhead dies, a swallowed creature can make a {@dc 10} Charisma saving throw. On a successful save, the creature reappears in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of the hammerhead. On a failed save, the creature is no longer {@condition incapacitated}, but it is banished to the Ethereal Plane.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. This attack deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) force damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The hammerhead enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

reaction.name: Spectral Strike
entries: When the hammerhead takes damage from a creature it can see within 120 feet of it, it teleports to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of that creature and immediately makes one slam or tail attack against it.

monster.name: Haunted Reflection
languages: understands any languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The reflection can magically communicate simple ideas, emotions, and images telepathically with any creature within 100 feet of it that can understand a language.

trait.name: Death Shift
entries: If damage reduces the reflection to 0 hit points, it can make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is thunder or from a critical hit. The reflection automatically fails this saving throw if there are no other reflective surfaces within 60 feet of it. On a success, the reflection regains 10 hit points and uses its Mirror Step (no action required) as the previous reflective surface that contained it is destroyed.

trait.name: Unsettling Glare
entries: When a creature that can see the reflection starts its turn within 60 feet of the reflection, the reflection can force the creature to make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw if the reflection isn't {@condition incapacitated}. A target automatically succeeds on this saving throw if it can't be {@condition frightened}. On a failed save, the creature has disadvantage on ability checks and its speed is halved until the start of its next turn.

Unless {@status surprised}, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the reflection until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the reflection in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

action.name: Concentrated Ire
entries: The reflection focuses a wave of psychic fury at one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that has averted its eyes from the reflection has advantage on this saving throw, and takes no damage if it succeeds on the save.

action.name: Mirror Step
entries: The reflection teleports into another nonmagical, metallic reflective surface of its choice that it can see within 60 feet of it.

reaction.name: Magic Reflection
entries: When the reflection is the only target of a spell or other magical effect that misses it or whose saving throw it succeeds, the reflection reflects the spell or effect back at its source. The source must be within 120 feet of the reflection or this effect fails. The reflection uses the spell save DC, attack bonus, and spellcasting ability of the original source.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Hawkren is an 11th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Arcane Siphon
entries: Once per turn, when Hawkren deals damage to a creature with a spell, he regains 9 ({@dice 2d8}) hit points.

trait.name: Deathly Resilience (1/Day)
entries: When Hawkren takes damage that would reduce him to 0 hit points, he is reduced to 1 hit point instead and can immediately use his reaction to cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The leader's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save {@dc 15}), requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The leader is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Eldritch Heads (3/Day)
entries: When the leader hits a creature with an attack, the leader can cause the target to take an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage. Alternatively, as a bonus action, the leader can regain 9 ({@dice 2d8}) hit points. While the leader has at least one use of this trait remaining, it can't be {@status surprised} and creatures with the Pack Tactics trait gain no benefit from that trait against the leader.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Hellborn
entries: The barbarian has advantage on any Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) or Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check it makes when interacting with fiends.

trait.name: Rage (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the barbarian can enter a rage that lasts for 1 minute. The rage ends early if the barbarian is knocked {@condition unconscious} or if its turn ends and it hasn't attacked a hostile creature or taken damage since its last turn. While raging, the barbarian gains the following benefits:

items: It has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
It gains a +2 bonus to the damage roll of any melee weapon attacks it makes (included in the attack).
It has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the barbarian can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the barbarian isn't wearing any armor, its AC includes its Constitution modifier. It can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: While the barbarian is raging, it makes two melee attacks, one of which must be with its claw.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage, or 12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage while raging.

action.name: Hellfire Claw (While Raging Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 bludgeoning or slashing damage (barbarian's choice) plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Feral Instinct
entries: The gladiator has advantage on initiative rolls. Additionally, if the gladiator is {@status surprised} at the beginning of combat and isn't {@condition incapacitated}, it can act normally on its first turn, but only if it enters its rage before doing anything else on that turn.

trait.name: Hellborn
entries: The gladiator has advantage on any Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) or Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check it makes when interacting with fiends.

trait.name: Planar Conspirator (1/Day)
entries: The gladiator can cast the {@spell contact other plane} spell, but only as a ritual.

trait.name: Rage (4/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the gladiator can enter a rage that lasts for 1 minute. The rage ends early if the gladiator is knocked {@condition unconscious} or if its turn ends and it hasn't attacked a hostile creature or taken damage since its last turn. While raging, the gladiator gains the following benefits:

items: It has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
It gains a +3 bonus to the damage roll of any melee weapon attacks it makes (included in the attack).
It has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
If it succeeds on a grapple check, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage, and it takes another 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage at the end of each of its turns until the grapple ends.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the gladiator can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the gladiator isn't wearing any armor, its AC includes its Constitution modifier. It can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gladiator makes two melee attacks. While the barbarian is raging, it can make one additional attack with its claw.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage, or 14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage while raging.

action.name: Hellfire Claw (While Raging Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning or slashing damage (gladiator's choice) plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The justice is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The justice makes two attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The antlion has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has {@status surprised}.

trait.name: Burrowed Camouflage
entries: While it is at least partially burrowed, the antlion has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in sand or loose earth.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the antlion surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 16 ({@damage 3d10}) damage from the attack.

trait.name: Antlion Cone
entries: The antlion can spend 10 minutes digging a cone-shaped pit in the sand, or some other loose earth. The cone is 20 feet deep and 40 feet across, and the sides are steep enough that the loose earth they are made with is a falling hazard. A standing creature that moves within the cone (even if by forced movement) for the first time on a turn must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. A creature that falls {@condition prone} while within the cone rolls to the bottom.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) piercing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends the antlion can't bite another target or use its sand throw, and if the target is a creature, it is {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Sand Throw
entries: One creature the antlion can sense within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Snapping Jaws
entries: When a creature the antlion can sense moves to within the reach of the antlion's bite and the antlion is not grappling a creature, it can make a bite attack against that creature.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of her turns, Kaybella can use a bonus action to take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} action.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Kaybella is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Kaybella instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails.

trait.name: Expert Cartography
entries: Kaybella has a +6 bonus to any ability check she makes using {@item cartographer's tools|PHB}, in addition to the ability modifier used for the check.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Kaybella deals an extra 31 ({@dice 9d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the agent that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the agent doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Kaybella wields a {@item pick and pocket|GriffonsSaddlebag2} and has a {@item hoarder's haul|GriffonsSaddlebag2} and a {@item wayfinder sphere|GriffonsSaddlebag2}, which are all described in appendix A.

trait.name: Elusive
entries: No attack roll can have advantage against Kaybella while she isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Reliable Talent
entries: Whenever Kaybella makes an ability check that lets her add her proficiency bonus, she can treat a {@dice d20} roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kaybella makes two attacks with her {@item pick and pocket|GriffonsSaddlebag2}.

action.name: Pick and Pocket
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4+ 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: Kaybella halves the damage that she takes from an attack that hits her. Kaybella must be able to see the attacker.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kiir's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). The kiir can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The kiir has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Planar Grounding
entries: The kiir can't be banished or otherwise unwillingly sent to another plane of existence.

trait.name: Undetectable Nature
entries: The kiir is always under the effects of the {@spell nondetection} spell. In addition, while it's under the effects of disguise self, its illusion isn't automatically detected by truesight, and the DC to discern the illusion increases to 24.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The kiir magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Recall (1/Day)
entries: The kiir teleports to its home plane or city, as if by the plane shift or teleport spell.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Feluciana's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 22}, {@hit 14} to hit with spell attacks). Feluciana can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Feluciana fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Feluciana has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Petrifying Glare
entries: When a creature that can see Feluciana's eyes starts its turn within 60 feet of her, she can force the creature to make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw if she isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly {@condition petrified}. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming {@condition petrified} on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by a {@spell greater restoration} spell cast at 7th level or higher spell or other magic.

Unless {@status surprised}, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see Feluciana until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at Feluciana in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

trait.name: Serpentine Reactiveness
entries: Once per turn, Feluciana can make an opportunity attack with her snake hair without expending her reaction.

trait.name: Virulent Weapons
entries: Feluciana's weapon attacks are magical. In addition, damage from her weapon attacks ignores resistance to poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Feluciana makes four attacks: one with her bident and three with her snake hair. When available, she can use her Petrifying Beam in place of her three attacks with her snake hair.

action.name: Bident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The bident flies back to Feluciana's hand immediately after making a ranged attack with it.

action.name: Snake Hair
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Petrifying Beam {@recharge 5}
entries: Feluciana's snakes focus a beam of petrifying energy at one creature she can see within 90 feet of her. A creature that has averted its eyes from Feluciana gains no benefit against this effect. The targeted creature must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must succeed on a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw at the end of its next turn or become {@condition petrified} until freed by a {@spell greater restoration} spell cast at 7th level or higher or other magic.

reaction.name: Retaliating Lash
entries: When a creature within 15 feet of Feluciana deals damage to her, one of her snakes lashes out, coiling itself around the creature. The target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or become {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}) and be pulled up to 10 feet toward Feluciana.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Feluciana moves up to her speed.

legendary.name: Snake Hair
entries: Feluciana makes an attack with her snake hair.

legendary.name: Summon Snakes (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Feluciana magically summons 4 ({@dice 1d4 + 2}) flying snakes or 1 swarm of poisonous snakes. A summoned creature appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of Feluciana, acts as her ally, and shares her Virulent Weapons trait. It remains for 1 minute, until it or Feluciana dies, or until she dismisses it as an action.

monster.name: Lava Wurm
languages: and Terran but can't speak them

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The wurm can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

trait.name: Noxious Resilience
entries: The wurm has advantage on saving throws made against harmful gases and vapors (such as the effects of a stinking cloud or a green dragon's poison breath).

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The wurm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Volcanic Body
entries: The wurm sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet. In addition, whenever a creature enters the area within 5 feet of the wurm for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, that creature takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Molten Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The wurm exhales molten metal in a 15-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and its speed is reduced by 10 feet. If a target's speed is reduced to 0 by this effect, it becomes {@condition restrained}. A creature can take an action to scrape or wash off the metal, ending the effect. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and its speed isn't reduced.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the panther is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Feline Fall
entries: When the panther falls and isn't {@condition incapacitated}, it can subtract up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating falling damage.

trait.name: Flashing Movement
entries: Whenever the panther moves on its turn, it can instead choose to teleport to an unoccupied space it can see, including into the air, leaving a harmless streak of electrical energy in its path. When it teleports in this way, it must spend an amount of movement equal to the distance it teleported.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The panther has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The panther makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Lightning Strike {@recharge 4}
entries: If the panther teleports at least 20 feet into the air as part of its movement, it can then use this action to fall into a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity or Constitution saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage and 21 ({@damage 6d6}) lightning damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the panther's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls {@condition prone} in the panther's space.

monster.name: Lothrem, the Wreathed Dragon

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If Lothrem fails a saving throw, they can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Nature's Restoration
entries: Lothrem regains 10 hit points at the start of their turn if they have at least 1 hit point. If they are in sunlight, they instead regain 20 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Lothrem can use their Frightful Presence. They then make three attacks: one with their bite and two with their claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage, plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of Lothrem's choice that is within 120 feet of Lothrem and aware of them must succeed on a {@dc 23} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Lothrem's Frightful Presense for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Ensnaring Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Lothrem exhales enriching breath on the ground in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide, causing a thick wall of tangled, thorny brush to magically grow in the area. The wall is 20 feet high and blocks line of sight. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 63 ({@damage 14d8}) piercing damage and is {@condition restrained} in the wall. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition restrained}.

The wall remains until the end of Lothrem's next turn, at which point it withers and disappears. A creature {@condition restrained} in the wall or one that is within 5 feet of the creature can use its action to make a {@dc 19} Strength check, freeing the creature on a success. For the duration, the area is {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, and when a creature moves into or within the area, it takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage for every 5 feet it travels.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: Lothrem magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than their own, or back into their true form. Lothrem reverts to their true form if they die. Any equipment Lothrem is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Lothrem's choice).

In a new form, Lothrem retains their own alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Lothrem's statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except and class features or legendary actions of that form.

legendaryHeader: The dragon can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Lothrem regains spent legendary actions at the start of their turn.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: Lothrem makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: Lothrem makes a tail attack

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Lothrem beats their wings. Each creature within 10 feet of Lothrem must succeed on a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. Lothrem can then fly up to half their flying speed.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mage-arbiter is a 20th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

trait.name: Justicar's Smite
entries: When the mage-arbiter hits with any attack, the target takes an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage (included in the attack). If the target has any remaining spell slots, it instead takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Legendary Spell Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the mage-arbiter fails a saving throw against a spell, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The mage-arbiter has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mage-arbiter makes three attacks.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage, or 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage if the target has any remaining spell slots.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage, or 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage if the target has any remaining spell slots.

reaction.name: Spellbreak
entries: When a creature the mage-arbiter can see within 120 feet of it casts a spell, the mage-arbiter disrupts the spell if it is of 3rd level or lower, causing it to fail and have no effect. If the target is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, the mage-arbiter must first succeed on a Charisma check ({@dc 10} + the spell's level) in order to disrupt the spell. If the spell is successfully disrupted, the target takes {@damage 1d4} force damage per level of the spell that was being cast.

variant.name: Mage-Arbiter with the Sword of the Spelldrinker
entries: The rank of mage-arbiter is known to be a notable mark of prestige, but only the most renowned of this rank carry the esteemed sword of the spelldrinker (see The Griffon's Saddlebag: Book 1). Such a mage-arbiter uses the mage-arbiter stat block, with the following changes:

items: It has a challenge rating of 16 (13,000 XP).
It has 3 uses of its Legendary Spell Resistance trait, instead of 2.
It has the Empowered Spellbreak and Nullify Atmosphere traits, as well as the Sword of the Spelldrinker action option (all described below).

entries.name: Atmospheric Nullification
entries: While the mage-arbiter is holding the sword of the spelldrinker, any magical light, darkness, or atmospheric effect within 30 feet of it is treated as nonmagical and breathable.

entries.name: Empowered Spellbreak (2/Day)
entries: When the mage-arbiter uses its Spellbreak reaction, it can choose to automatically disrupt the spell if it is of 5th level or lower. If the spell is successfully disrupted, and it has a casting time of one action or one bonus action, the spell is absorbed into the sword of the spelldrinker. The mage-arbiter can release the absorbed spell as an action, using the slot level, spell save DC, spell attack bonus, and spellcasting ability of the original caster, but it is otherwise treated as if the mage-arbiter cast the spell. The sword can only have one spell absorbed at a time.

entries.name: Sword of the Spelldrinker
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 ({@damage 1d8 + 8}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage, or 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage if the target has any remaining spell slots.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The magebreaker is a 15th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

trait.name: Justicar's Smite
entries: When the magebreaker hits with any attack, the target takes an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage (included in the attack). If the target has any remaining spell slots, it instead takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The magebreaker has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The magebreaker makes two attacks.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage, or 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage if the target has any remaining spell slots.

monster.name: Malfuriel the Betrayer

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Malfuriel's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). Malfuriel can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Bloodmire Adaptation
entries: Malfuriel is immune to the diseases described in the {@table Bloodmire Diseases|GriffonsSaddlebag2} table.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede Malfuriel's darkvision.

trait.name: Divine Awareness
entries: Malfuriel knows if he hears a lie.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If Malfuriel fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Malfuriel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Forsaken Weapons
entries: Malfuriel's weapon attacks are magical. When Malfuriel hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Malfuriel makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) slashing damage, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Corrupting Touch (2/Day)
entries: Malfuriel touches a creature, and that creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 hour. The {@condition charmed} target obeys Malfuriel's spoken or telepathic commands.

If the target suffers any harm, or receives a command to harm itself, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect ends for it, the target is immune to Malfuriel's Corrupting Touch for the next 24 hours.

legendaryHeader: Malfuriel can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Malfuriel regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Malfuriel moves up to half his speed.

legendary.name: Greatsword (2 Actions)
entries: Malfuriel makes one greatsword attack.

legendary.name: Accursed Step (3 Actions)
entries: Malfuriel magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Malfuriel can then choose one creature he can see within 5 feet of him. The target must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. Malfuriel regains hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

variant.name: Optional: Malfuriel's Weakened State
entries: At your discretion, Malfuriel may be in a weakened state from his battle with Syre when the party first encounters him. If so, his hit point maximum is reduced to 109, making him a CR 9 encounter worth 5,000 XP.

monster.name: Merchant Lord
languages: plus up to three other languages

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The merchant is a 7th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). They know the following bard spells:

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Magic Coin
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}1 bludgeoning damage plus 13 ({@damage 2d12}) thunder damage.

action.name: Money Talks (4/Day)
entries: The merchant enchants a coin in its hand with divination magic, which lasts for 10 minutes or until the merchant ends the effect early (no action required). For the duration, a creature holding the coin that knows at least one language can understand the meaning of any word the merchant speaks, and when the merchant speaks, that creature understands what the merchant says.

Alternatively, the merchant can use an action to see and hear through the enchanted coin until the start of its next turn, using its own senses as if it were in the coin's space. During this time, the merchant is {@condition deafened|PHB|deaf} and {@condition blinded|PHB|blind} with regard to its own senses.

reaction.name: Chance {@recharge 4}
entries: When a creature within 60 feet of the merchant makes an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw, the merchant flips a coin. If it's heads, the creature can roll a {@dice d8} and add the number rolled to the {@dice d20}. If it's tails, one random creature within 60 feet of the merchant gains a {@dice d8}, which it can roll and add to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw it makes before the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Shapechanger (Mimic)
entries: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into a keg, mug, vat, or other alcohol-related object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except when it polymorphs into an object it can choose to change its size to Tiny or Small until it polymorphs back into its true form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
entries: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also {@condition grappled} by it (escape {@dc 13}). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary alcohol-related object.

trait.name: Grappler
entries: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Mizanoros's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 22}, {@hit 14} to hit with spell attacks). Mizanoros can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Aura of Punishment
entries: Whenever a hostile creature within 30 feet of Mizanoros takes damage, that creature takes an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Mizanoros has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Mizanoros's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, Mizanoros can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Mizanoros fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Mizanoros wields Hatred, the Wrathful Edge, a sentient weapon with an Intelligence of 14, a Wisdom of 13, and a Charisma of 17. It has hearing and darkvision out to a range of 120 feet. The weapon communicates telepathically with Mizanoros and can speak, read, and understand Common and Infernal.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Mizanoros makes three attacks: one with its sting and two with Hatred, the Wrathful Edge. It can cast any of its at will spells in place of one Hatred, the Wrathful Edge attack.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@dice 3d4 + 10}) piercing plus 15 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 24} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. The {@condition poisoned} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Boil Blood {@recharge 5}
entries: Mizanoros attempts to magically boil the blood of up to three creatures it can see within 120 feet of it. Each target must make a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw, taking 41 ({@damage 6d12}) fire damage and 41 ({@damage 6d12}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that is {@condition poisoned} by Mizanoros's sting has disadvantage on this saving throw, and a creature that doesn't have blood is immune to this effect.

action.name: Hatred, the Wrathful Edge
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 1d12 + 11}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire or lightning damage (Mizanoros's choice). If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, Mizanoros gains temporary hit points equal to the fire or lightning damage dealt.

bonus.name: Blood Transfer (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, Mizanoros can cast the {@spell vampiric touch} spell. For the duration, he can repeat the attack on each of his turns as a bonus action.

legendary.name: Hatred Attack
entries: Mizanoros makes one attack with Hatred, the Wrathful Edge.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Mizanoros moves up to his speed.
